docstring.long_description:
Read one or more current samples from a National Instruments compactDAQ device. The connection must have been initialized with a create task before calling this blocks.

This instrument will likely only be compatible with Windows systems due to
NI driver availablity. To use the instrument you must install the runtime:

https://www.ni.com/en/support/downloads/drivers/download.ni-daq-mx.html
docstring.short_description: Reads one or more current samples from a National Instruments compactDAQ device.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The first input channel for which a created task has been initialized.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Time to wait for samples to become available. If you set timeout to 0, the method tries once to read the requested samples and returns an error if it is unable to.

parameters.name: wait_infinitely
parameters.description: If True, the method waits indefinitely for samples to become available. If False, the method waits for the amount of time specified by timeout.
